More Notes: Global mean increase in TC intensification rate in regions close to the coast
Global mean TC intensification rate for 1979-1999 is 0.37 kt/6-hr, while for 2000-2020 it is 1.15 kt/6-hr. The result is statistically significant at the 5% level.
